name: promptlab
title: PromptLab
description: Create custom AI commands using powerful placeholders
author: HelloImSteven

preferences.title: General Settings
preferences.name: pdfOCR
preferences.label: Use OCR For PDFs
preferences.description: If checked, PromptLab will use OCR to extract text from PDFs. This takes longer but enables analysis of more PDF content types.

preferences.title: Export Location
preferences.name: exportLocation
preferences.description: The folder where exported commands and chats will be saved.

preferences.title: Custom Placeholder Files
preferences.name: customPlaceholderFiles
preferences.description: A comma-separated list of JSON files containing custom placeholders. These files must follow the format of the original custom_placeholders.json file. See the documentation for more information.

preferences.name: primaryAction
preferences.title: Primary Command Action
preferences.description: The top action of the actions menu in command response views.

preferences.name: condenseAmount
preferences.title: Level of Automatic Input Condensing
preferences.description: The amount of automatic input condensing to apply to the input text. Higher levels will remove more characters and cut out excess verbiage, resulting in far fewer tokens. However, this may result in less accurate results. Adjust this value according to the model's token limit. For Raycast AI, use 'Medium' or 'High'.

preferences.title: Prompt Prefix
preferences.name: promptPrefix
preferences.description: Text to prepend at the start of every prompt. This can be used to set context for all commands.

preferences.title: Prompt Suffix
preferences.name: promptSuffix
preferences.description: Text to append and the end of every prompt. This can be used to set context for all commands.

preferences.name: modelEndpoint
preferences.title: Model Endpoint
preferences.description: The API endpoint of the model used to generate PromptLab command output. Set to 'Raycast AI' to use the Raycast AI API.

preferences.name: authType
preferences.title: API Authorization Type
preferences.description: The authorization type for the model endpoint, e.g. API Key or Bearer. This is only used if the model source is set to something other than Raycast AI.

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: API Key
preferences.description: The API key for the model source. This is only used if the model source is set to something other than Raycast AI.

preferences.name: inputSchema
preferences.title: Input Schema
preferences.description: The JSON schema of the endpoint used to generate PromptLab command output. This is only used if the model source is set to something other than Raycast AI. Use {prompt} to represent PromptLab's entire input to the model.

preferences.name: includeTemperature
preferences.label: Include Creativity Parameter
preferences.description: If checked, PromptLab will include a temperature (creativity) parameter in the model input, using the value specified during command creation. You may need to disable this if the model does not support temperature. Disabling this will also disable the 'Creativity' textfield in the command creation view.

preferences.name: outputKeyPath
preferences.title: Output Key Path
preferences.description: The key path to the text output in the JSON response from the model endpoint. For example, choices[0].message.content, for the OpenAI API. This is only used if the model source is set to something other than Raycast AI.

preferences.name: outputTiming
preferences.title: Output Timing
preferences.description: Whether output from the model endpoint should be processed synchronously or asynchronously. Often, this is also an option on the model API. This is only used if the model source is set to something other than Raycast AI.

preferences.name: lengthLimit
preferences.title: Prompt Length Limit
preferences.description: The maximum length of the prompt that will be sent to the model endpoint, beyond which it will be truncated. Larger values will support more content, but may result in token count errors. Adjust this value according to the model's token limit (but leave some space, e.g. 1000 characters, for additional input and placeholders).

commands.name: create-command
commands.title: New PromptLab Command
commands.description: Create a custom PromptLab command accessible via 'Search PromptLab Commands'

preferences.name: groupByCategory
preferences.title: Search Settings
preferences.label: Group Commands By Category
preferences.description: If checked, each command category will have its own section in the search results.

commands.name: chat
commands.title: PromptLab Chat
commands.description: Start an interactive chat with the context of selected files provided'

preferences.title: Default Chat Settings
preferences.name: useSelectedFiles
preferences.label: Selected Files
preferences.description: If checked, the selected files will be used as context for conversations by default.

preferences.name: useConversationHistory
preferences.label: Conversation History
preferences.description: If checked, the conversation history will be used as context for conversations by default.

preferences.name: autonomousFeatures
preferences.label: Autonomous Agent Features
preferences.description: If checked, autonomous agent features such as 'Allow AI To Run Commands' will be enabled by default.

preferences.name: basePrompt
preferences.title: Base Prompt
preferences.default: I want you to act as an interactive information engine. When I supply a question, you will respond with an answer based on any information I've provided and your own inferences.
preferences.description: The base prompt that provides the initial context for conversations.

commands.name: import-commands
commands.title: Import PromptLab Commands
commands.description: Import custom PromptLab commands from a JSON string

commands.name: discover-commands
commands.title: PromptLab Command Store
commands.description: Discover commands from the PromptLab community

commands.name: manage-models
commands.title: Manage Models
commands.description: Manage the models used to generate PromptLab command output

commands.name: menubar-item
commands.title: PromptLab Menu Item
commands.description: Show PromptLab shortcut in the menu bar

preferences.title: Shortcuts To Show
preferences.name: showNewChatShortcut
preferences.label: New Chat
preferences.description: Whether to show the 'New Chat' shortcut in the menu.

preferences.name: showAllCommandsShortcut
preferences.label: All Commands
preferences.description: Whether to show the 'All Commands' shortcut in the menu.

preferences.name: showPromptLabStoreShortcut
preferences.label: PromptLab Store
preferences.description: Whether to show the 'PromptLab Store' shortcut in the menu.

preferences.name: showNewCommandShortcut
preferences.label: New Command
preferences.description: Whether to show the 'New Command' shortcut in the menu.

preferences.title: Display Settings
preferences.name: displayIcons
preferences.label: Display Icons
preferences.description: Whether to display icons next to the menu items.

preferences.name: displayColors
preferences.label: Display Icon Colors
preferences.description: Whether to display colors in the menu item icons.

preferences.name: displayFavorites
preferences.label: Display Favorites
preferences.description: Whether to separate favorite commands from the rest of the menu items.

preferences.name: displayCategories
preferences.label: Display Categories
preferences.description: Whether to separate commands by category.
